name: Heavenly Outskirts
description:
My 2nd year mid-year exam from 2019! The platformer mechanics were programmed by my lecturer and I had to make all the art assets and level design ✨ music is by the talented Ashley Claassen!

Make sure you've clicked on the game window and press Enter to play~

Use Left and Right arrow keys to move and Spacebar to jump

The game is super rough around the edges and doesn't really end properly but I'm still happy because I learned a lot from this and I had a ton of fun making a million lil assets and particles and characters hahaha

There's a lil puzzle to get to the end! Can you figure it out? 🌹
